text: Khabardar! Tum woh log ho kay Allah ki raah mein kharch kernay kay liye bulaye jatay ho to tum mein say baaz bakheeli kerney lagtay hain aur jo bukhul kerta hai woh to dar-asal apni jaan say bakheeli kerta hai. Allah Taalaa ghani hai aur tum faqeer (aur mohtaj) ho aur agar tum roogardaan hojao to woh tumharay badlay tumharay siwa aur logon ko laye ga jo phir tum jaisay na hongay
